text:
@SecPompeo .@POTUSPressPool  .@StateDept 
"enormous evidence" 
- reminded that US intelligence had issued a statement – that the scientific consensus was that the virus was not manmade or genetically modified – .@SecPompeo replied: “That’s right. I agree with that.”

https://t.co/Gvpy9L9TIv
